meanings.definition: The state or condition of being pansexual.
meanings.sent1: Her pansexualities were evident in her open-mindedness towards all genders.
meanings.sent2: The concept of pansexualities promotes inclusivity and acceptance.
meanings.sent3: His pansexualities led to some interesting conversations at the dinner table.
meanings.sent4: In a world full of labels, her pansexualities shone like a beacon of freedom.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of pansexualities lies in embracing love without boundaries.

meanings.definition: The sexual attraction or orientation toward people regardless of their gender identity or biological sex.
meanings.sent1: Their pansexualities allowed them to love freely without constraints.
meanings.sent2: Understanding pansexualities means valuing connections beyond physical attributes.
meanings.sent3: At the party, their pansexualities sparked intriguing discussions about love.
meanings.sent4: In a world fixated on binaries, pansexualities offer a refreshing perspective.
meanings.sent5: The rainbow flag symbolizes the diversity of pansexualities in our society.
